Name: MAKE IT as an Artist
About the game: **ATTENTION: This game is my feeble attempt to substantiate video games as a viable artistic medium. It's very experimental and definitely not for everyone. ** Can you Make it as an Artist? Play the most realistic artist simulation of all time. CONTROLS: use arrow keys to move press [space] for everything else
